Package com.example.appointment.controller

Interface AppointmentAlertsInterface

All Superinterfaces:
SQLControllerInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
MainController, ViewCustomersController
public interface AppointmentAlertsInterface extends SQLControllerInterface
An interface that is used to create alerts for if an appointment is expiring within 15 minutes of login.

  • Method Details

    • appointmentAlert

      default void appointmentAlert(ArrayList<Appointment> appointments)
      A method that creates a JavaFX alert if a user has appointments within 15 minutes of login. This method has two main parts:
      1. If they are no appointments within 15 minutes the user is informed with an alert saying as such.
      2. If they are appointments within 15 minutes
      If the appointments are within 15 minutes a list is created using a StringBuilder. This StringBuilder takes in the appointment ID, title, start time, and end time for each appointment. This enables each appointment to be displayed in a single alert message instead of bombarding the user with multiple alerts.
      Parameters:
      appointments - Passes in a list of appointments.

    • getExpiringAppointments

      default ArrayList<Appointment> getExpiringAppointments(ArrayList<Appointment> appointments)
      A method that creates a list of expiring appointments from the list of total user appointments. It goes through each appointment adds it to the list if the appointment is after the current time, and expires within 15 minutes of the current time.
      Parameters:
      appointments - A list of appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of a list of appointments expiring within 15 minutes of login.
